title: Top-Rated Stylish China City Break in UNESCO World Heritage-Listed Quanzhou
description: Follow in the footsteps of the ancient travellers on the legendary Silk Road with a stay at InterContinental Quanzhou, an IHG Hotel, positioned in the centre of the UNESCO World Heritage-listed city. Head to CaiFeng Lou Chinese Restaurant for Fujian plates and local specialities, explore the surrounding boutique retail plaza or simply wander the cityâ€™s wide streets to discover its wealth of historic and cultural treasures, including the fabled beginning of the ancient Silk Road.
offer_address: No.1005 Fenghai Road, Fengze District, Quanzhou, China, 362000
